column3: bu me atsɛn na nye ɔman ebusuyɛfo yi ndzi asɛm mma me: Gye me fi nyimpa ɔdaadaafo na osisifo no nsamu."
ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na atow me akyen? Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na menam ridzi awerɛhow wɔ ɔtamfo nhyɛdo ntsi yi?"

column2: "Ma wo kan na wo nokwar mbra; ma wombegya me kwan: Ma wɔmfa me mbra wo bepɔw krɔnkrɔn no do

column3: Wɔ m’ehurusi enyigye Nyankopɔn nkyɛn: Na medze nsankutsen beyi wo ayɛw
ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na iridzi mo mu awerɛhow yi? Ma w’enyi nda Nyankopɔn do; na mebɛda ho eyi no ayɛw
